derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French perpetuite, from Latin perpetuitas, from perpetuus 'continuing throughout' (see perpetual)

entry.def: If something is done in perpetuity, it is intended to last for ever.

example.ex: The US Government gave the land to the tribe in perpetuity.
